name: Wallbot
description:
Made for mini-jam 73 in 3 days.

In this very short 1-bit styled game, you can open and close treasure chests to change color! This gives you the power to go through walls that are the same color as you! Help Wallbot escape the dungeon that he somehow managed to lock himself in with some wall-based puzzle action!

-------------------------

Controls:

ARROW KEYS - move

SPACEBAR - open chests

-------------------------

(All code, art, animations, and music by Rishit Khare)
